title: Love this building! Love this location! Amazing Stuff in Cool Area
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 755 Sq.
The Pointe at Warner Center is ideal for those looking for a world of convenience and comfort.
Our prime location, in the heart of Woodland Hills puts shopping, dining, entertainment, and major freeways at your utmost convenience.
The Pointe at Warner Center offers quality and affordability in an unbeatable location.
Take your pick of three innovative one and two bedroom floor plans that make living at home a special pleasure.

Here at The Pointe at Warner Center, you'll find all the amenities you want for easy living including designer-inspired kitchens with pantry and breakfast bar, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, spacious walk in closets, central air and heating, full size washers and dryers, private patios or balconies, and much more!

To help enhance your quality of living, The Pointe at Warner Center offers residents the luxury to enjoy the outdoors with a cool dip in shimmering swimming pool, relaxing in our soothing hot tub, or strolling around our lushly landscaped grounds.
Take advantage of our state-of-the-art fitness center, lavish clubhouse with billiards and business center with copy and fax services.
We are also a pet friendly community!
Visit our photo gallery to see why The Pointe at Warner Center is the perfect place to call home!
- Computer Niches with High-Speed Internet Access
- Frost Free Refrigerators with Ice maker
- Large Upscale Bathrooms with Oversize Roman Oval Tubs
- Game Room with Pool Tables, Air Hockey and More
- Cyber Lounge with Full Service Business Center
- Additional Storage Units Available for Residents
- Private Resident Movie Screening Room with Video Library
- Enclosed, Lavishly Detailed Pool Area with Lush Landscaping
- Modern Fitness Center with High-Tech Cardio
- Outdoor BBQ Area with Alfresco Dining
Woodland Hills apartments The Pointe at Warner Center
